subject: Re: Kindly help to separate my records from the file
body:
>>>>> "Goksie" == Goksie   writes:

Goksie> I know i have been repeating this for a while now.

First, don't email me directly if you're also sending it to beginners@perl.org.

Second, if you've been "repeating it", it's more and more likely that people
are now ignoring you, even if you change your post.

Third, if you aren't able to understand the help you're getting, and that's
why you're "repeating it", then it might be time to go hire someone instead of
trying to do it yourself.

I did not look at the rest of your post.

-- 
Randal L. Schwartz - Stonehenge Consulting Services, Inc. - +1 503 777 0095
 
Perl/Unix/security consulting, Technical writing, Comedy, etc. etc.
See PerlTraining.Stonehenge.com for onsite and open-enrollment Perl training!
